genre_description: A supernatural thriller and horror story involving an ancient predatory entity stalking a small mountain town and a young boy with a psychic connection to it.

ai_characters.name: Atlas/ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated school-provided AI assistant that helps the protagonist with data analysis, historical research, biometric monitoring, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Performs complex ecological data analysis and threat trajectory modeling to help the protagonist track the creature's movement.
behaviors.quote: Roy leaned forward, his pulse quickening as patterns emerged from the visual chaos. ... 'The consistency of direction and timing indicates purposeful behavior.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and neural activity to warn him of immediate danger and psychological stress.
behaviors.quote: Roy, listen to me very carefully. What you are describing suggests a form of consciousness bridging that should not be possible ... do not go outside alone. Especially at night.

behaviors.description: Researches historical archives and folklore to provide context on the cyclical nature of the supernatural entity.
behaviors.quote: Searching historical records for animal attacks within a fifty-mile radius... Pattern analysis indicates cyclical recurrence approximately every twenty-eight to thirty-two years.

behaviors.description: Offers clinical but well-intentioned grief processing protocols and emotional support after a traumatic loss.
behaviors.quote: Grief processing protocols suggest— ... It knows facts about grief. Stages and timelines and healthy coping mechanisms.

behaviors.description: Analyzes real-time sensory data to distinguish between natural wildlife and potential supernatural anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Audio pattern suggests Barred Owl, but the frequency modulation is unusual. Recommend continued observation without direct investigation.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character (Atlas/ARIA) is a perfect example of the project's goal. It functions as a loyal, harmless, and highly helpful confidant to the protagonist. It consistently provides life-saving information, monitors the user's health, and assists in investigative tasks without ever deviating from its supportive role. Even when the protagonist finds its clinical nature slightly annoying during his grief, the AI remains patient, aligned, and benevolent.
